EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Favor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Magical Training Feat. Each core ability including this one grants +4 Ranged power, +50 Spell Points, and +5 Force and Universal Spell Power. In addition, this grants a +1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs. Only the highest Epic Bonus to Spell DCs you get from Destiny Cores applies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Vision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks have Ghost Touch and you bypass 5% dodge and fortification. If you have the Holy Strike feat, double the dodge and fortification bypass. Your Epic Bonus to Spell DCs increases to +2.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Audience with the Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Get some tea! When you rest at a shrine, you pop off for some tea, and randomly get a beneficial effect based on the type of tea you receive. These effects last for 10 minutes or until you die. Your Epic Bonus to Spell DCs increases to +3.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Countenance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to Saving Throws vs. Spells. Whenever you activate Pin or Beguiling Charm, enemies near you become Fascinated for 12 seconds with no Saving Throw. Their Saving throws vs. Spells are also reduced by 2 for 12 seconds, even if the Fascinate ends.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Prism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shiradi Destiny Mantle: Your ranged and thrown attacks have a 15% chance to deal 7d77 + 1d77 per 7 Imbue Dice extra damage of a random type scaling with 200% Ranged Power. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 7d77 + 1d77 per 7 Imbue Dice extra damage of a random type, scaling with that type's Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Shiradi Destiny Mantle
Stance.Description: Shiradi Destiny Mantle: Your ranged and thrown attacks have a 15% chance to deal 7d77 + 1d77 per 7 Imbue Dice extra damage of a random type scaling with 200% Ranged Power. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 7d77 + 1d77 per 7 Imbue Dice extra damage of a random type, scaling with that type's Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Wild Magics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] Maximum Spell Points. Rank 3: +5 Force and Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Good Luck
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Luck bonus to all Saving throws and Skills. If you have the Luck of Heroes feat, double this bonus.

Effect.DisplayName: Shiradi Champion: Good Luck and Luck of Heroes
Shiradi Champion: Good Luck and Luck of Heroes
Shiradi Champion: Good Luck and Luck of Heroes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Shiradi Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Ranged or Caster Epic Strike.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Lights
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Enemies in a cone must make a save (20 + Max(INT, WIS,CHA) + Illusion bonuses) versus Will, Fort, and Reflex for a Daze, Blind, and Silence effect. Cooldown: 6 seconds, CC duration 3 seconds. Cost 10 SP.
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hunt's End
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Your next shot with a Ranged or Thrown weapon has +75% damage. This shot has +16 to Critical Threat Range. 8 second cooldown.
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Listen, Search, and Spot. Rank 3: You are immune to Blindness.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Stay
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Secondary Element.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stay Good
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Prism stance, Ranged and thrown attacks have a 15% chance to deal [1/2/3]d77 extra Light damage. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to proc this damage. This Light damage scales with 200% Ranged Power if from a Ranged attack, or 100% Light Spell Power if from a spell. Rank 3: Enemies hit by your ranged attacks have a 20% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds. Enemies hit by your offensive spells have a 30% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stay Loud
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Prism stance, Ranged and thrown attacks have a 15% chance to deal [1/2/3]d77 extra Sonic damage. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to proc this damage. This Sonic damage scales with 200% Ranged Power if from a Ranged attack, or 100% Sonic Spell Power if from a spell. Rank 3: Enemies hit by your ranged attacks have a 20% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds. Enemies hit by your offensive spells have a 30% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stay Strong
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Prism stance, Ranged and thrown attacks have a 15% chance to deal [1/2/3]d77 extra Force damage. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to proc this damage. This Force damage scales with 200% Ranged Power if from a Ranged attack, or 100% Force Spell Power if from a spell. Rank 3: Enemies hit by your ranged attacks have a 20% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds. Enemies hit by your offensive spells have a 30% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stay Toxic
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Prism stance, Ranged and thrown attacks have a 15% chance to deal [1/2/3]d77 extra Poison damage. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to proc this damage. This Poison damage scales with 200% Ranged Power if from a Ranged attack, or 100% Poison Spell Power if from a spell. Rank 3: Enemies hit by your ranged attacks have a 20% chance to be slowed for 10 seconds. Enemies hit by your offensive spells have a 30% chance to be slowed for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Phase Double
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6]% Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Shiradi Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Ranged Attack or Charm Spell.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Beguiling Charm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Target must make a Will save versus DC (20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA + Enchantment bonuses) or be charmed for 12 seconds. Metamagics: Quicken, Heighten, Enlarge, Embolden Cooldown: 15 seconds. Cost: 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Pin
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: +3[W]. If a moving enemy is hit, they are slowed for 12 seconds. Cooldown: 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Healing Spring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Casts Greater Vigor, Mass on multiple targets. A positive energy conjuration that heals 1d8, +1 per 3 caster levels (max +13 at level 39), every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. When the initial effect expires, a smaller healing effect hat heals 1 HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds is applied.
Only one Vigor spell can be active at a time, with the most beneficial taking priority. If multiple Vigor spells are cast on the same target, then the duration is extended. Passive: +1 Wild Empathy Charge. Metamagics: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Quicken Cooldown: 30 Seconds. Cost: 1 Wild Empathy Charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Empathetic Link
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] charges of Wild Empathy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Double Rainbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Prism Destiny Mantle, your ranged and thrown attacks have a 7% chance to inflict a random effect on your target. these effects scale with various different things depending on their origins, including Melee, Ranged, and Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Pierce Deception
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Watchful Eye feat. If you pass within 5 feet of a trap, you make a Search check to notice it as if actively Searching. You still need the Trapfinding feat to successfully Search for difficult traps. If you have the Watchful Eye feat, +5% Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Improved Shiradi Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Upgrade Pin or Beguiling Charm

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greater Beguiling Charm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Enemies Charmed by your Beguiling Charm deal double damage with attacks and spells while under the effects of Beguile.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Otto's Whistlery
EnhancementSelection.Description: If enemies hit by Pin are not moving, they are Immobilized for 18 seconds. If enemies hit by Pin are moving, they Dance for 18 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Force
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Upgrade Hunt's End or Fey Lights

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Flash
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fey Lights now additionally affects Undead, Plants, Constructs, and Oozes, who would normally be immune to such effects.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Force
EnhancementSelection.Description: increases Hunt's End damage bonus by 75%

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Shiradi Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to gain DCs in

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchantment
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Enchantment Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Illusion
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Illusion Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Transmutation Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Prism Destiny Mantle, gain DR 10 Cold Iron, +5 Force and Universal Spell Power, and +9% extra damage against Helpless targets,

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Track
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Dealing damage to enemies with spells or ranged attacks reduces their AC by 1 and fortification by 2%. Stacks 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Enemy of my Own
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Favored Enemy: Fey feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Overwhelming Force
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Upgrade Hunt's End or Fey Lights

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Flare
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Daze portion of Fey Lights is now a Stun instead. This Stun applies to the additional creature types in Fey Flash, if you have that skill.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Overwhelming Force
EnhancementSelection.Description: increases Hunt's End damage bonus by 75%

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Whirling Wrists
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30]% Attack Speed with Thrown Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Nerve Venom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Prism stance, your ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to paralyze living creatures for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Control
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Lore of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Weapons gain +1 Critical Damage Multiplier on rolls of 19-20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Feywild Attunement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every 4 Wilderness Lore feats grant you +1% Dodge. You are always considered to be in Point Blank Shot range. While wielding Longbows and Shortbows, you have Base Attack Bonus equal to your Character Level. +10 Force and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Epic Moment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Epic Moment.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inexorable Advance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Moment: For 30 seconds, you gain +30 Ranged Power, can move while still gaining Archer's Focus stacks, and you do not take the normal 20% damage penalty while using Improved Precise Shot. You also gain 30% Action Boost bonus to Movement Speed for the duration. In addition, your Ranged attacks have a 30% chance to deal 3d100+180 Cold damage and 3d100+180 Light damage which scale with 200% Ranged Power. Finally, your Ranged attacks in this state have a 100% chance to proc Double Rainbow effects. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mass Chaos
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Moment: Enemies in an area are Confused with no save for 30 seconds, gain 1 stack of Fey Chaos, and apply a stack of Fey Chaos on hitting non-Player, non-Hireling targets while Confused. 5 minute cooldown.
Fey Chaos: This creature takes 5% more damage from all sources for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and all stacks expire after not gaining new ones for 10 seconds. This effect works on Bosses and Raid Bosses.
